title: Vast seagrass meadows will shield coastline
full_text: Vast seagrass meadows will shield coastline. Trials to restore the saltwater plant to the Humber Estuary are hugely encouraging, experts say.. A project to restore vast meadows of a saltwater plant to the Humber Estuary has reached a major milestone, experts say. Seagrass is one of the most powerful natural tools for tackling climate chang… [+1756 chars]
